name: TgMusicBot
description: A Telegram Music Bot deployed on Heroku.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID, get it from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash, get it from https://my.telegram.org

TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token, get it from https://t.me/BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram User ID, get it from https://t.me/GuardxRobot

MONGO_URI.description: Your MongoDB URI, get it from https://cloud.mongodb.com

API_URL.description: API URL for the bot to download music (optional)

API_KEY.description: API key for the bot to (optional)

COOKIES_URL.description: Cookies URL for the bot; Note use BatBin urls

DEFAULT_SERVICE.description: Default search platform (Options: youtube, spotify, jiosaavn) Default: youtube

AUTO_LEAVE.description: Leave all chats for all userbot clients
